title: Planting Romaine Towers  Starting Irrigation System

tasks.task: Weeding and preparing garden beds for fall planting.
subtasks: Evaluating garden conditions and energy levels to determine next steps.
Preparing the first garden bed for planting, including raking.
Planting seeds (romaine and green towers) using an Earthway seeder for the first time.

tasks.task: Setting up irrigation system for fall garden.
subtasks: Addressing issues with the irrigation setup, including using a half-inch blank poly adapter and troubleshooting a tangled irrigation line.
Adjusting sprinkler spacing to ensure proper coverage for the garden rows.
Testing the irrigation system to check functionality and make necessary adjustments.

tasks.task: Planning and preparing for fall gardening tasks.
subtasks: Considering future irrigation needs and timing for fall planting.
Anticipating challenges for fall gardening and formulating a plan for successful planting and maintenance.
